Free delivery for order over RM450 within Peninsular Malaysia
Delivery Option Location Charges Applicable Delivery Details
Standard Delivery Within Klang Valley RM20 Flat Rate Arrival within 2-5 working days. (Tracking number will be provided via WhatsApp once posted)
Beyond Klang Valley RM30 Flat Rate
Express Delivery Within Klang Valley RM40 Flat Rate Same-Day Delivery Order must be placed before 4pm, arrival by Monday to Sunday 11am - 6pm. (Please notify customer service and we will proceed accordingly)

settings.text:
Delays in Delivery

In case of any unexpected delays due to bad weather, floods, or events out of our control, our customer service team will strive to communicate promptly to all affected customers.

Order Status

Our Customer Service Representative will provide tracking code via WhatsApp.

Away During Delivery

If you or no one is available to receive the order(s), we will be in touch to schedule a second delivery. Additional delivery charges may incur.

Changing Delivery Address

If you have already checked out and would like to change the delivery address, contact our customer service team at +6016 9562 840 (Joyce) or email support@mrchowliquorstore.com as soon as possible; we will try our best to rearrange the scheduled delivery.

If the rearrangement is unsuccessful, it will be considered a new delivery. We will inform you of any additional delivery costs that might be incurred, and your order will be redelivered pending your approval.

Restricted Areas

We do not deliver to and within the vicinity of the following areas:

  • Hospitals
  • Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) 1 and 2
  • Government buildings
Delivery Coverage

We currently do not deliver to East Malaysia and countries outside of Malaysia.

What if my orders are incomplete, damaged or lost in delivery?

Please get in touch with our customer service team at +6016 9562 840 (Joyce) or email support@mrchowliquorstore.com; we will arrange for a replacement upon verifying your claims.
